General.Description: Such a digital currency and blockchain service platform, Emercoin is the solution for anyone who want to start with innovative platform where people exchange everything today. Emercoin focuses more on the production of coins by PoS than others. Mining PoS is so promising because it has a bonus on the interval 1-512 difficulty for high initial issue of coins and increasing difficulty.
General.Features: Emercoin is so hybrid of NameCoin and PPCoin. It also brings many outstanding features such as the secure shell management system  that every participants needed. Moeover, without password, you can access uncensored domain name system, peering with OpenNIC. Emercoin also gives them the huge storage for electronic business cards for use with EMCSSL. Last but not least, the domain of EMC is decentralized by pay-per-click advertising network.
General.Technology: By OpenNIC, EMC ensure that all the data of users will be kept in security. Moreover, EMCDPO is such a digital proof of ownership solution for physical or digital goods and services. Besides, Emercoin offers a 6% annual POS reward with 30 day coin maturity.
